question.title: Minimum Flips in Binary Tree to Get Result
question.similarQuestions: [{"title": "Check If Two Expression Trees are Equivalent", "titleSlug": "check-if-two-expression-trees-are-equivalent", "difficulty": "Medium", "translatedTitle": null}, {"title": "Design an Expression Tree With Evaluate Function", "titleSlug": "design-an-expression-tree-with-evaluate-function", "difficulty": "Medium", "translatedTitle": null}, {"title": "Evaluate Boolean Binary Tree", "titleSlug": "evaluate-boolean-binary-tree", "difficulty": "Easy", "translatedTitle": null}]
hints: Try using tree DP to solve this problem.
Find the minimum operations to change each subtree to true and to false separately.
For nodes representing boolean operations, find the minimum operations by trying all combinations of values to which the child nodes can evaluate.
